examples.text: Do you know who you are?
I want to set up the chat bot for my shop
What should I know about you?
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
How can you solve my problems?
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.
I do not know what to ask
Is there anything you can help me with?
Tell me about what kind of things you do?
What are my options that you can help with?
What are you able to deal with?
What are you able to understand?
What can I ask you to do?
What else can you help me with?
What kinds of things can you do?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
Can I connect to an agent?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Can you connect me with a real person?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Could you please transfer me to your master?
How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?
I don't want to talk to a bot.
I don't want to talk to you
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
I want an agent to help me
I want to talk to a person
I would like to speak to a human
I would like to speak to someone
Please assist me to get to an agent
Please connect me to a live agent
Please let me talk to a human being.
Yes, take me to a real person
I d like to stop doing this
It was nice chatting with you
Hello I am looking for some help here
Am I chatting with a human?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Are you a human or a bot?
How can you prove you are a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?
Can't believe you are that good
I like what you did there! :)
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
You gave me exactly what I need!
Can I be sure that my stored card details are held securely?
Do you have protection against hacks?
How do I know if my card info is kept safe?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?
How is my credit card info secured?
I'd like proof of a secure chat
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
Is this a trusted chat site?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
Why would I trust this chat?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing!
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding, I am a little bit dumb!!

generic.title: Select english to continue in english - eliga español para continuar en español

values.text: Hi, I'm Mimi, and I am here to help you!
Ya te vas? :C No me dejes!!

I am sad to hear you are struggling with mental health issues... The first thing I can recommend you to do is to get professional help. However, if you are not able to do so you can try going to the BMCC counseling center! (https://www.bmcc.cuny.edu/student-affairs/counseling/) Good mental health is a key to having good grades in college, tell them about your problems and explain why they are an obstacle for you when it comes to classes.
These are good apps to help you with this issue:
I recommend an app for journalism since it is helpful for your mental health. It can be any app you want.
Balance (Mobile Devices)
Fabulous-Daily Routine Planner(Mobile devices)
BetterHelp-Therapy (Mobile devices)
NYC Office of mental health (https://my.omh.ny.gov/bi/pd/saw.dll?PortalPages)
mindgarden-tech.co.uk
headspace.com
And for more resources go to the resources page!
I am sorry but my hoomans are busy right now and unfortunately, I can't connect you with them!
I am a cat-bot... don't you see????
Hi, my name is Mimi and I was created to help you! I'm here to recommend resources that can help you in college. But remember, it's always best to seek professional help!
What's yours? I bet it is a cute name!
What do you need help with  $Name_Nombre
No lo he entendido. Puedes intentar reformularlo!
¿Puede reformular su declaración? No estoy entendiendo! perdon, soy un poco tonta....

Me entristece saber que estás luchando con problemas de salud mental... Lo primero que puedo recomendarte es que busques ayuda profesional. Sin embargo, si no puedes hacerlo puedes intentar ir al centro de asesoramiento de BMCC (https://www.bmcc.cuny.edu/student-affairs/counseling/). Una buena salud mental es clave para tener buenas notas en la universidad, cuéntales tus problemas y explícales por qué son un obstáculo para ti a la hora de ir a clase.
Estas son buenas aplicaciones para ayudarte con este tema:
Balance (Dispositivos mobiles)
Te recomiendo descargues alguna app para journalism de tu gusto! ayudan con tu salud mental.
Fabulous-Daily Routine Planner (Dispositivos mobiles)
BetterHelp-Therapy (Dispositivos mobiles)
Oficina de ayuda para salud mental de NYC (https://my.omh.ny.gov/bi/pd/saw.dll?PortalPages)
mindgarden-tech.co.uk
headspace.com
Y para más recursos, vaya a la página de recursos.
As I said, my name is Mimi. I am just a cat-bot! you can't configure me or something! but you can pet me!! I was created by Dinorah, Sara, Jewel, and Brandon in a super-secret laboratory.
En que necesitas ayuda $Name_Nombre
Oh, así que quieres tener buenas calificaciones en la universidad, ¿eh?
Te recomiendo estas aplicaciones!
Notion.so (Para PC y Para dispositivos mobiles )
Study Bunny (Para dispositivos mobiles)(superbyte.site)
Flora (Para dispositivos mobiles) (flora.appfinca.com)
GoodNotes (Paid, only available on IOS devices)(goodnotes.com)
Lifeat.io (Sitio Web)
mybib.com (Extension de chrome para citaciones)
todoist.com (Extension de Chrome)
Homework Tracker (Extension de Chrome)
Ah! y prueba nuestra University Study Flow App en nuestro website!
Y para más recursos, vaya a la página de recursos.
Cute name!! I love it $Name_Nombre
Hola me llamo Mimi y fui creada para ayudarte! Estoy aqui para recomendarte recursos que te podran ayudar en la universidad. Pero recuerda, siempre es mejor buscar ayuda profesional!
¿Cual es tu nombre? Apuesto que es lindo!

I am here to recommend apps and resources for school and mental health! And also to be pet and loved!!!! And definitely scratch you or something when you are distracted and not paying attention in class...
Hola, Soy Mimi, y estoy aqui para ayudarte!!
Oh, so you want to do good at college huh!
I recommend you these apps!
Notion.so (On desktop and mobile devices)
Study Bunny (Mobile devices) (superbyte.site)
Flora (Mobile devices) (flora.appfinca.com)
GoodNotes (Paid, only available on IOS devices) (goodnotes.com)
Lifeat.io (Website)
mybib.com (Chrome extension for citations)
todoist.com (Chrome extension)
Homework Tracker (Chrome extension)
And definitely try our University Study Flow App on our website!
And for more resources go to the resources page!

generic.title: Jokes written by: Kelsey Pelzer
generic.description: Jokes are from: https://parade.com/1038010/kelseypelzer/cat-jokes/ if you want to see them all!

values.text: Why did the cats ask for a drum set? They wanted to make some mewsic!
What’s a cat’s favorite TV show? Claw and Order.
How did the Mom Cat know she was pregnant? Her test was pawsitive.
What normally happens when kitties go on a first date? They hiss
What’s a cat’s favorite cereal? Mice crispies.
What color do kittens love the most? Purrple.
What does the cat say after making a joke? “Just kitten!”
When cats need to go to the airport, who do they call? A tabby.
Why did the cat have to go to an accountant? They got caught up in a purramid scheme
What made the cat upgrade his phone? He wanted to finally get pawtrait mode.
Why are kittens actually excellent bosses? They have great littership.
When a cat doesn’t want to say goodbye, what do they say instead? “See ya litter!”
Why don’t you want to play Monopoly with a cat? They tend to be cheetahs
Why do cats hate laptops? They don’t have a mouse.
Why do cats make horrible DJs? They always paws the tunes.
What did the sick cat say? “I feel clawful!”
Where do cats enjoy spending a family day? The mew-seum
Que nombre tan lindo!!! $Name_Nombre!
Are you leaving me? :c don't leave me alone!!
